Package fi.fta.controllers

Class ServicesController<S extends LayerService,SM extends ServiceManager<S,? extends LayerServiceDAO<S>>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.fta.controllers.CategoryBeansController<S,LayerServiceUI,SM>
      • fi.fta.controllers.ServicesController<S,SM>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - wrapper for database data
    SM - data manager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcGISServicesController, DownloadableServicesController, WFSesController, WMSesController

    public class ServicesController<S extends LayerService,SM extends ServiceManager<S,? extends LayerServiceDAO<S>>>
extends CategoryBeansController<S,LayerServiceUI,SM>
    Controller for operations on different services. A super class for controllers of specific service.

    Usually operation is restricted to the rights of currently logged user.

    Author:
    andrysta

                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public <SUI extends java.io.Serializable> SimpleResult<SUI> info​(@RequestBody
                                                                 LayerServiceUI ui,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Extracts information from the remote valid service taking service name and URL. The service is not added to BASEMAPS database yet.
        Type Parameters:
        SUI - JSON wrapper object
        Parameters:
        ui - service object wrapper, but only name and/or URL input required for this operation
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        wrapper for service object

      • updateInfo

        @RequestMapping(value="/update-info/{id}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage updateInfo​(@PathVariable("id")
                                java.lang.Long id,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Immediately update of service info from remote source. The service must be already in a database.
        Parameters:
        id - database ID of service to be updated
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message

      • scheduleUpdateInfo

        @RequestMapping(value="/schedule-update-info/{id}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage scheduleUpdateInfo​(@PathVariable("id")
                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Schedules update of service from remote source. The service must be already in a database.
        Parameters:
        id - database ID of service to be updated
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message, however this does not tell if service was successfully updated (or was scheduled for update at all), because the action is deferred
